attributes.action: Remove the national and 0845 local rate numbers from benefit helplines and to replace with normal landline numbers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The benefit contact numbers currently in use at the moment are all numbers that if called from a mobile phone will cost more money than if on a land line. this is costly if all you have is a mobile to use. As the telephones in the Job centers are usually all in use and are not private, All of your details of your life i.e. N.I number & contact details are the first things the people on the other end ask for are being overheard by all and sundry in the Job centre. and the details are then susceptible to identity theft. so I suggest two solutions to this I) Make a normal landline number available or II) Give an E-mail address for contact purposes.
